title: Halmont Properties Corporation First Quarter Results

organizations.name: halmont properties corporation first quarter results

text:
TORONTO, May 30, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- HALMONT PROPERTIES CORPORATION (TSX-V:HMT) announced today that net income to common shareholders for the three months ended March 31, 2018 was $486,000 as compared to net income of $380,000 for the three months ended March 31, 2017.
Three months ended (in millions) March 31, 2018 March 31, 2017 Revenue $ 1,535 $ 1,148 Net income - total 613 488 - for common shareholders 486 380 Net income per share for common shareholders 0.47 ¢ 0.40 ¢ Subsequent to March 31, 2018, Halmont purchased a commercial office building located at 221 Yonge Street in Toronto, Ontario for $5.5 million.
The book value of each common share, based on the Company’s December 31, 2017 IFRS appraisals and including the net income earned in the first quarter, was 48¢ per share as at March 31, 2018.
Halmont Properties Corporation invests directly in real estate and securities of companies holding property, energy and infrastructure assets.
